summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FOTIVA photography SaaS platform. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all endpoints working correctly. Frontend is fully operational with successful user registration, authentication, and navigation between all main pages. Design follows guidelines with proper FOTIVA branding, dark sidebar, and clean layout.

design_issues.issue: Minor logout timeout issue - logout button works but navigation timeout occurs

passed_tests: Backend API Health Check - All 14 endpoints working (100% success rate)
User Registration API - Creates users successfully with JWT tokens
User Authentication API - Login/logout working correctly
Client Management API - Create and retrieve clients
Event Management API - Full CRUD operations working
Payment Management API - Create payments and mark as paid
Gallery Management API - Create and retrieve galleries
Dashboard Metrics API - Returns proper financial data
Landing Page - Hero section, features, pricing, footer all functional
Registration Flow - Form validation and successful account creation
Login Flow - Authentication and redirect to dashboard
Dashboard Navigation - All sidebar links working (Eventos, Pagamentos, Galeria, Configurações)
Page Routing - Proper URL navigation between all pages
Design Guidelines - FOTIVA branding, colors (#4A9B6E green), dark sidebar, clean layout
Responsive Design - Proper layout on desktop viewport
Toast Notifications - Success messages working correctly

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All core functionality working, minor logout timeout issue
